subject: Shipping delay inquiry
description: I ordered the product on January 1st but still haven't received it. The tracking shows it's been in transit for 10 days. Can you provide an update?

subject: Product not working after setup
description: I followed the setup instructions exactly but the product won't start. I've tried restarting multiple times and checking all connections. The error light is blinking red. Please help!

subject: Refund request for defective item
description: The product I received is defective - it arrived with a cracked screen and won't turn on. I need a refund or replacement. I've attached photos of the damage.

subject: Billing question about recent charge
description: I see a charge on my card for $299.99 but I only ordered one item. Can you explain why this amount was charged? I expected it to be much lower.

subject: Feature request: dark mode
description: Would love to see a dark mode option for the interface. The current white background is straining on the eyes during long work sessions. This would be a great quality of life improvement.

subject: Login issues with account
description: I'm unable to log into my account. I've tried resetting my password multiple times but the reset emails aren't arriving. My email address is definitely correct.

subject: Question about product compatibility
description: Before I purchase, I need to know if this product is compatible with macOS Ventura. The specifications page doesn't mention Apple products. Can you confirm compatibility?

subject: Delayed response to previous ticket
description: I submitted a ticket 5 days ago and haven't heard back. This is urgent as I'm in the middle of a project deadline. Can someone please follow up on ticket #TKT-12345?

subject: Request for training materials
description: I've purchased your product but would like more detailed training materials. The current documentation is good but I'd benefit from video tutorials or webinars. Do you offer any advanced training resources?

subject: Bug report: data not saving
description: When I try to save my work, it appears to save successfully but when I reopen the file, my changes are gone. This happens consistently. I'm using Windows 11. Please investigate this critical bug.

subject: Update on order status
description: My order #ORD-98765 was supposed to arrive yesterday but I still haven't received it. The tracking information hasn't updated in 3 days. Can you provide an update?

subject: Feature request: API access
description: As a developer, I'd love to see API access to integrate your product with our internal systems. This would allow us to automate several workflows and improve efficiency. Is this on your roadmap?

subject: Complaint about customer service
description: I called customer service yesterday and waited on hold for 45 minutes before giving up. When I finally got through to someone, they were unhelpful and seemed rushed. This is unacceptable service quality.

subject: Request for bulk discount
description: We'd like to purchase 50 licenses for our organization. Do you offer bulk purchase discounts? If so, what would the pricing be for 50 units?

subject: Positive feedback and suggestion
description: Just wanted to say that I'm really happy with the product! It has significantly improved our team's productivity. One suggestion: it would be great if you could add keyboard shortcuts for common actions.
